subject: ASIA-PAC SERVICE IS NOW LIVE FOR TODAY'S SESSION
CHRISTMAS PERIOD OPENING HOURS
content:
Business as usual up to 1845GMT Monday 24th December 2018

Closed for business 25th, 26th, 27th, 28th December 2018 and 1st January 2019

Normal service will resume at 0630GMT on Wednesday 2nd of January 2019 for the beginning of the EU Session

Market closures and desk opening hours

 

24th December - Business as usual up to 1845GMT Monday 24th December 2018

 

Floor Trade

1. CME/CBOT –FX and Interest Rates close at 1800GMT/1200CST, Equities Futures and Options close at 1815GMT/1215CST

2. NYSE – Early close at 1800GMT

Electronic Trade

1. CME – Equity, interest rates, FX close 1815GMT/1215CST, Energy closes at 1845GMT/1245CST

2. ICE – US Calendar: https://bit.ly/2KXWq6u, EU Calendar: https://bit.ly/2wLNLzH

3. Eurex – Closed for trading in all derivatives

4. Euronext Derivatives – Closes begin at 1255GMT/0655CST

Cash Index:

1. FTSE – Close 1230GMT/0630CST onwards

2. Euronext Cash – Closes begin at 1305GMT/0705CST

3. DAX - Closed
